20110110220039.000|20110110220040.000|CC1|POLITICAL VIOLENCE.

20110110220047.000|20110110220048.000|CC1|1912 WHILE CAMPAIGNING FOR THE  
20110110220048.000|20110110220049.000|CC1|PRESIDENCY.

20110110220054.000|20110110220054.000|CC1|MONTH BEFORE INAUGURATION.      
20110110220054.000|20110110220057.000|CC1|THE BULLET KILLED THE MAYOR OF  
20110110220057.000|20110110220058.000|CC1|CHICAGO.                        
20110110220058.000|20110110220105.000|CC1|1950, A PLOT TO KILL TRUMAN.    
20110110220105.000|20110110220107.000|CC1|JACK KENNEDY, KILLED.

20110110220114.000|20110110220117.000|CC1|ASASSEN, SAVED ONLY BY A QUICK  
20110110220117.000|20110110220118.000|CC1|THINKING AGENT.

20110110220125.000|20110110220129.000|CC1|KING, ALL KILLED BY GUNMEN.     
20110110220129.000|20110110220133.000|CC1|WE'VE GROWN UP KNOWING THIS     
20110110220133.000|20110110220133.000|CC1|STUFF.                          
20110110220133.000|20110110220134.000|CC1|NOT IN CANADA, NOT IN MEXICO.   
20110110220134.000|20110110220136.000|CC1|IT'S ONLY HERE.

20110110220929.000|20110110220931.000|CC1|SECOND AMENDMENT ON THIS SHOW.  
20110110220931.000|20110110220931.000|CC1|IT'S THERE.

20110110220934.000|20110110220936.000|CC1|TALK ABOUT SECOND AMENDMENT     
20110110220936.000|20110110220938.000|CC1|REMEDIES, PUTTING TARGETS OVER  
20110110220938.000|20110110220941.000|CC1|PEOPLE AND USING GUNS, NOT AS A 
20110110220941.000|20110110220943.000|CC1|METAPHOR, BUT IN SOME STRANGE   
20110110220943.000|20110110220945.000|CC1|NEW WAY, USING THE THREAT OF GUN
20110110220945.000|20110110220946.000|CC1|PLAY IN POLITICS.               
20110110220946.000|20110110220950.000|CC1|IT'S NEW, IT'S SCARY AND REAL.  
20110110220950.000|20110110220951.000|CC1|IT IS NOT A METAPHOR WHEN PEOPLE
20110110220951.000|20110110220954.000|CC1|TALK ABOUT LOCK AND LOADING,    
20110110220954.000|20110110220957.000|CC1|RELOADING LIKE PALIN DOES, THEY

20110110221350.000|20110110221350.000|CC1|       If you have certain

20110110221825.000|20110110221827.000|CC1|AND OBVIOUSLY, I THINK MOST     
20110110221827.000|20110110221829.000|CC1|SITUATIONS, IT IS NOT A GOOD    
20110110221829.000|20110110221833.000|CC1|PROGNOSIS, BUT IF YOU'RE GOING

20110110222004.000|20110110222004.000|CC1|IT TAKES.
